# Broadstreet Ads

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="broadstreetads"
  data-network="229"
  data-zone="63940"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration semantics, see the [Broadstreet Ads documentation](https://information.broadstreetads.com/amp-configuration/).

### Required parameters

-   `width`
-   `height`
-   `data-network`
-   `data-zone`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-place`
-   `data-keywords`
